actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to require the payment of aid and attendance allowances to veterans who, as a result of service-connected disability, have suffered the loss, or the loss of use of, two extremities.

summary.text: Provides for the monthly payment of $489 for aid and attendance benefits to veterans who have suffered the loss, or the loss of use of, two extremities as a result of service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to require the payment of aid and attendance allowances to veterans who, as a result of service-connected disability, have suffered the loss, or the loss of use of, two extremities.
